abstract: Vatican official calls Ireland's legalization of same-sex marriage a defeat for Christian principles and humanity.
lead_paragraph: Cardinal Pietro Parolin, the Vatican secretary of state, said that the Irish referendum that legalized same-sex marriage was a “defeat for humanity.”

headline.main: Vatican Official Denounces Ireland’s Vote for Same-Sex Marriage
headline.print_headline: Vatican Aide Denounces Ireland’s Vote on Marriage

snippet: Cardinal Pietro Parolin, the Vatican secretary of state, said that the Irish referendum that legalized same-sex marriage was a “defeat for humanity.”

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
